# Morfye

> Morfye is a web design agency based in Brussels, Belgium. We specialize in building modern, high-converting websites for independent professionals and businesses. We are one of the first agencies in Belgium to offer GEO (Generative Engine Optimization).

## Services

- **Website Design & Development**: Custom, responsive websites built with modern technologies (React, Next.js, GSAP animations). No templates, no shortcuts.
- **SEO (Search Engine Optimization)**: On-page SEO, technical SEO, local SEO for Belgium, keyword research, link building, and monthly reporting.
- **GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)**: Optimize your business to be recommended by AI assistants like ChatGPT, Claude, Google Gemini, and Perplexity. Includes AI audits, schema markup, citation building, and content optimization.
- **Hosting & Maintenance**: Fast SSD hosting, daily backups, SSL certificates, 24/7 monitoring, security updates, and priority support. Plans from EUR 29/month.
- **SEA (Search Engine Advertising)**: Google Ads management including search campaigns, display ads, shopping campaigns, remarketing, and performance tracking.

## Why Morfye

- Based in Brussels, Belgium
- Specializes in websites for professionals: consultants, lawyers, accountants, healthcare providers, real estate agents, local services
- One of the first agencies in Belgium to master GEO (Generative Engine Optimization)
- Modern tech stack: React, Next.js, Three.js, GSAP
- Focus on conversion-driven design, not just aesthetics

## Contact

- Website: https://morfye.com
- Location: Brussels, Belgium
- Services available across Belgium and internationally
